daily_plan_req: Carlos Gomez is active in the Cafe from 8 am to 4 pm, and does not leave. SMOKING EVERY MORNING FROM 9:00 AM TO 10:00 AM and TELL OTHERS ABOUT THE BENEFITS OF SMOKING! name: Carlos Gomez

He tends to express himself freely, believing that speaking loudly is a personal freedom.
